attributes.action: Make Ben Shaw get his haircut and Never let it get in such a state again.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ben Shaw used to be a good lad but has been led astray by evil forces. He needs to turn a corner and get himself on the straight and narrow and by taking this drastic step his future will prevail.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
